businessProfile.name: Nonna Bella's
businessProfile.address: 765 Deer Park Ave, North Babylon, NY 11703, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 765 Deer Park Ave, North Babylon, NY 11703, USA

reviews.text:
Nonna Bella's is TOP notch for food ESPECIALLY catering !!! Everything is so flavorful and fresh always PLUS the side room is amazing for showers birthdays and more !

Nonna Bella's has become one of my go to for my customers also !!

This is hands down the BEST full service pizzeria in the town of Babylon. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They have the best pizza hands down. Nonna Bella‚Äôs also has great food we eat here once a week. It‚Äôs the only take out we feel is worth the money in 2025! Thank you Garret for always taking care of us. #bestpizza
The food at Nonna Bella‚Äôs is excellent. I‚Äôve ordered there several times and the food has ALWAYS been OUTSTANDING!!!

Perfect place for an event! I do not normally write reviews but I had to thank Nonna Bellas for their amazing service for my daughter first communion party. We had 40 people and the service and food was amazing. I highly recommend booking Nonna's for a private event. The wait staff, bartender and the booking staff were all top tier and really were super nice, accommodating and just went above and beyond.  Thanks Nonna's!

Ever since we discovered Nonna Bella‚Äôs, it‚Äôs been our go-to pizza and dinner choice! The prices are great and the staff is always kind and friendly- especially the delivery drivers! Never received a bad meal or an incorrect order. They are top notch; and food is amazing!!! Keep up the good work üëç

The pizza was not made when I ordered it ... it was barely warm ...
VERY DISAPPOINTED ... one thing Long Island is not in short of is pizza parlors

detailedReviews.author: Robert O'Connor
detailedReviews.text: Took order gave delivery time... must be closed no show

detailedReviews.author: Nadeem Anjum
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I‚Äôve tried ever to be honest, would come again!

detailedReviews.author: Marisol Rivas
detailedReviews.text: Every-time we go in there the food is always fresh and the service is fast and friendly

detailedReviews.author: Marylou Cuomo
detailedReviews.text: Always outstanding!! Wonderful staff

detailedReviews.author: Clint Carson
detailedReviews.text:
Food is always delicious
Friendly staff love the coupons

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Myers
detailedReviews.text: Love this place!  Even their gluten free options are delicious!  My son is a very picky eater and this is his favorite place!

detailedReviews.author: Lenny Bruce
detailedReviews.text:
BTW, I did finally go there and it was open. Next time if you're going to close it for whatever, vacation, or renovation, then put that on your outgoing message or on your website. So, I tried one slice just to see if I liked it and it was Horrible. It cheese tasted sour actually it's cheap cheese they use. I'm Italian and I knew that right away. I'd never go back there again. Also, they charged of a lot more and with the debit card which you're not supposed to do. It's against the NYS Law to have a surcharge on a debit card which is a complete release of cash. For those that doubt me, look it up. Plus the fact that it was a lot more than where I go at Richie's pizza in Deer Park. He doesn't charge any surcharge I use the debit card all the time! $3.50 a slice and two slices $7. Never had a problem  I need high quality cheese.
You can read the original post below the I had but it doesn't matter cuz I'm not going there anymore. üëá

I've been calling these people all day and all night and the same thing I've done today as I did last week and nobody's answering.It says they're closed when I just search the hours online so what's going on? How can you do business with a pizza place when they'll answer phone to place an order?

detailedReviews.author: Kenny Wilcox
detailedReviews.text: Great food

detailedReviews.author: Johnny D
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious and beautiful girls behind counter

detailedReviews.author: ANGii MAR
detailedReviews.text:
Nonna Bella's is TOP notch for food ESPECIALLY catering !!! Everything is so flavorful and fresh always PLUS the side room is amazing for showers birthdays and more !

Nonna Bella's has become one of my go to for my customers also !!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Henry
detailedReviews.text: My family has ordered from this restaurant several times for delivery. The food is always fresh and delicious and delivery has always been on time. We will continue to give our business to this great restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Doris Menjivar
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza place and delicious food

detailedReviews.author: maura kehoe
detailedReviews.text:
Great food, best pizza around!
Every Friday night we have Nonna Bella. It‚Äôs the best pizza in Long Island!
Service is amazing and they serve you with a smile every time. Love Nonna Bella‚Äôs

detailedReviews.author: Fran Chamberlain
detailedReviews.text: Great food as always and friendly staff.  One of my favorite Italian restaurants in the area!

detailedReviews.author: Tracey Christoffersen
detailedReviews.text: Fast delivery. Food is delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Charboneau
detailedReviews.text: The ladies at Nonna were so amazing! They always go up and beyond to make each interaction perfect!

detailedReviews.author: Nichole 1127
detailedReviews.text: This is hands down the BEST full service pizzeria in the town of Babylon. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They have the best pizza hands down. Nonna Bella‚Äôs also has great food we eat here once a week. It‚Äôs the only take out we feel is worth the money in 2025! Thank you Garret for always taking care of us. #bestpizza

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Cuozzo
detailedReviews.text:
Nonna Bellas is a pillar of the community.
They should nominate the next candidate for president.

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Jackowski
detailedReviews.text: Always friendly , Helpful and food is always Delicious!!

detailedReviews.author: Laurel Roberts
detailedReviews.text: Delicious spinach & artichoke pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Vin M
detailedReviews.text: Food is always fresh, pizza is always spot on. Great food for good pricing.

detailedReviews.author: Anna Veneziano
detailedReviews.text: Staff is always friendly and courteous.  The food is always delicious and abundant.  Eat in occasionally but take home more. Highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Ro Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Great food

detailedReviews.author: Terrence Sullivan
detailedReviews.text: Been going to Nonna Bellas for years. Whenever I go to any other pizza place I rank it on a scale of 1 to Nonna Bellas. Best pizzeria in Long Island, especially if you like that traditional NY thin slice!

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Kurman
detailedReviews.text: The food at Nonna Bella‚Äôs is excellent. I‚Äôve ordered there several times and the food has ALWAYS been OUTSTANDING!!!

detailedReviews.author: Madasar Hussain
detailedReviews.text: Nanaaa bellaaa is amazing pizzaria  great staff food is always fresh great quality have been ordering from there for many years and have recommended them to all my family and friends

detailedReviews.author: Joanne Currie
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic selection of different pizzas by the slice...nice thin, light crust****

detailedReviews.author: lisa rosenberg
detailedReviews.text: Calamari was a little dry. It was only the round circles.

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Lamont
detailedReviews.text: My go to pizza place.That says a lot considering there is a pizzeria on almost every corner. No matter what you order it will be delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Ann Reddy
detailedReviews.text: The food is always delicious and large portion sizes. The staff is ALWAYS so nice and friendly. We go out of our way to order for these reasons!

detailedReviews.author: kenny gottesman
detailedReviews.text: Food is always amazing never had a bad experience

detailedReviews.author: Laura Mashburn
detailedReviews.text: Been with them since they opened , love their food,service&,servicers are very friendly, helpful and quick to serve. Gary always helps everyone. Very Happy with Nona Bella.

detailedReviews.author: Mai Vio
detailedReviews.text: This is our go to pizza spot. When guests come over we get a pepperoni pie with garlic crust because we want to show off lol

detailedReviews.author: Kim Lozada
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza! Always my go to!!

detailedReviews.author: Sherri Biffar
detailedReviews.text: There are pizza places on every other corner but Nonna Bella is the best. The owner and all of the employees are so nice and polite. The pizza is the best from Nassau and Suffolk combined. I live in western Nassau and come to Nonna‚Äôs in North Babylon for my pizza. I also bring friends to blow them away with their food.

detailedReviews.author: Steve McDevitt
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza place in the world

detailedReviews.author: Sean Pipes
detailedReviews.text: Hands down the best pizza on Long Island.

detailedReviews.author: Angelina Badalamenti
detailedReviews.text: Love this place!  I eat from Nonna Bella‚Äôs at least 3 sometimes 4 xs a week.  I have had 2 big parties there also,  it was great!  Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Jenna Pannullo
detailedReviews.text: Food is always great and their service is impeccable. I love getting deliveries from them, they always quick and food is always piping hot and fresh. The portion sizes are great too. Delivery drivers are always polite and friendly, and the staff that works the counter is the same.

detailedReviews.author: Ray Okurowski
detailedReviews.text: Best in the city

detailedReviews.author: Ken Schreiber
detailedReviews.text:
I ordered a Sicilian pizza pie.
I arrived in 12 minutes,
pizza was already on top of the oven waiting for my pickup. When I got home it was overdone and dry. What ever happened to making a fresh pie for you steady customers.
No to happy ruining my dinner...

detailedReviews.author: Brent Hinds
detailedReviews.text: This was my first time going here and it was very good to bad I was picking up an order for Uber eats deliveries. Plus it's to far from where I live to order food from.

detailedReviews.author: Janine Gagliardi
detailedReviews.text: The staff was friendly and attentive. The pizza was delicious

detailedReviews.author: Peter DeNigris
detailedReviews.text: Excellent Pizza and Pasta Dishes.   Staff friendly & hard working.  Garrett & staff beats the competition.

detailedReviews.author: Michael
detailedReviews.text: Always friendly staff and great food!!Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Fichera
detailedReviews.text: My #1 pizza place

detailedReviews.author: KELLY WALSH
detailedReviews.text:
Great food, great service üëç
HIGHLY RECOMMEND

detailedReviews.author: Patricia Wilkeson
detailedReviews.text: Quick delivery and large pirtion

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Kelly
detailedReviews.text:
Great food
Great service

detailedReviews.author: Justin Blackman
detailedReviews.text: Lived in the area for 2 years now and quickly realized that Nonna Bella‚Äôs is the spot for us! We are frequent patrons and are never disappointed. Definitely going to miss this place when we move out of state this year.

detailedReviews.author: Doreen Smith
detailedReviews.text: Good variety of food. Nice, friendly, knowledgeable,  staff. Cesar salad pizza is amazing

detailedReviews.author: JGCUOZZO
detailedReviews.text: Great place great food great service

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Weiss
detailedReviews.text: Best cheese pizza, best Grandma pizza and hands down best specialty pizza (Margarita is a favorite) and generously portioned heroes in town !!! Plus a private dining room with a bar !!

detailedReviews.author: Deanna Sturiale
detailedReviews.text: Ever since we discovered Nonna Bella‚Äôs, it‚Äôs been our go-to pizza and dinner choice! The prices are great and the staff is always kind and friendly- especially the delivery drivers! Never received a bad meal or an incorrect order. They are top notch; and food is amazing!!! Keep up the good work üëç

detailedReviews.author: Greys Abizeid
detailedReviews.text: We live in West Islip and have been ordering from Nonna‚Äôs for the past few months. We‚Äôve tried different things on the menu after being obsessed with their spinach and artichoke pizza. You can‚Äôt go wrong with anything you order. Everything is honestly delicious. The staff is also very pleasant! Definitely give them a chance ü•∞

detailedReviews.author: Sulay M
detailedReviews.text: The service is great! The people at the counter were all pleasant,  they all had a smile and greet us well. It was a group of 8 of us all had different slices of pizza and we all loved it. Coming from Brentwood to them from now on.

detailedReviews.author: John Meehan
detailedReviews.text: Always great food with warm and friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Tesla Carrasquillo
detailedReviews.text: Perfect place for an event! I do not normally write reviews but I had to thank Nonna Bellas for their amazing service for my daughter first communion party. We had 40 people and the service and food was amazing. I highly recommend booking Nonna's for a private event. The wait staff, bartender and the booking staff were all top tier and really were super nice, accommodating and just went above and beyond.  Thanks Nonna's!

detailedReviews.author: Cristina Dagrosa
detailedReviews.text: This place never disappoints! Even their plain cheese pie is great! My fav is the personal pie- artichoke and spinach! But literally every pie is awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Jackie Balcerak
detailedReviews.text: As always , the best! We've been customers for 20 years, great food, and customer service!

detailedReviews.author: Celeste Domino
detailedReviews.text: Nonna Bella.they are the best! Won‚Äôt go any place else!

detailedReviews.author: Will Kj
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza 10/10 !!

detailedReviews.author: Dominic Demeri
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is excellent and the service and staff are great.

detailedReviews.author: Jean Gumpel
detailedReviews.text: The food is always great and fast delivery

detailedReviews.author: Frank Reddy
detailedReviews.text: Everyone  is always so pleasant. The food is always very good.

detailedReviews.author: jackie esposito
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Correa
detailedReviews.text: Food is always fresh and delicious,  the service is great. They are a well oiled machine there, plenty of staff ready to help you. The owner is great, works hard and always takes the time to say hello.

detailedReviews.author: Mike McIlmurray
detailedReviews.text: I order from Nonna Bella‚Äôs 2-3 times a week. Best pizza and pasta in town!!!

detailedReviews.author: Patricia Dawn Leccese
detailedReviews.text: Picked up a pie!  Some pf the best pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Stevenson221
detailedReviews.text: Great food

detailedReviews.author: Kathy Post
detailedReviews.text: All our food has. Been wonderful exactly how we ordered it. Delivery man was polite and kind. Service was very quick.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the delicious and fresh quality of the pizza, making it a standout favorite. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and upbeat staff significantly enhance the dining experience, creating a welcoming atmosphere. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant's timely and reliable delivery service is highly appreciated by customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent business hours and lack of communication about closures - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews about product quality and customer service - review management can address this concern
Competition with other local pizza parlors - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
